issue.title: gazebo6 always crashes when adding a ROS camera plugin (libgazebo_ros_camera.so)

content.raw:
@Stefan_Kohlbrecher in this specific case, we made a mistake in breaking the gazebo6 ABI. We have a policy [described briefly here](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=process&cat=development) of not breaking API or ABI in minor or patch releases, which we did between 6.2.1 and 6.3.0, but we made a mistake and will fix it soon. We are working in additional Jenkins jobs to confirm API/ABI stability of our release branches with each new commit.

As to the crashes you experienced in May, those could possibly have been caused by changes in ROS ABI that didn't trigger a rebuild of the `ros-indigigo-gazeboX-ros-control` packages because we build that manually. We should fix this as well.
